metaDescription.content: Stay updated on the digital marketing industry. Read our latest articles on SEO news and research to keep up.

content.html:
Industry News

Keep up with the latest trends and updates in digital marketing with industry news. Discover what’s new, what’s working, and what’s changing in the online world to stay ahead of the curve and grow your business.

Industry News

5 min read
Understanding Google’s August 2024 UpdateOn August 15th, Google announced it was launching a Core Update for August 2024. While Google originally said it would take a month to complete, the update’s roll-out ended on September 3rd, lasting for a total of 20 days.
Mordy ObersteinSep 19, 2024

Industry News

14 min read
The Top 10 Marketing Conferences to Attend in 2024Want to learn from the world’s brightest marketers? These are the most impactful marketing conferences happening in 2024.
Semrush TeamAug 07, 2024

Industry News

10 min read
17 Strategy-Shaping Ecommerce Trends You Should Know in 2024Discover the top 17 ecommerce trends shaping online shopping in 2024, from AI to AR and B2B to DTC.
Sydney GoMay 21, 2024

Industry News

11 min read
Analyzing Google's March 2024 Core UpdateOn March 5, 2024, Google announced the launch of the March 2024 Core Update. The update is without doubt, one of the most significant SEO events of 2024. This is due to a variety of reasons related to the nature of the rollout, its relationship to the Helpful Content Update, the unique statements coming out of Google, the current state of the web, and more.
Mordy ObersteinMay 16, 2024

Industry News

15 min read

Digital Trends 2024: Exploring Key Digital Marketing Innovations

Explore key insights from Semrush‘s new 2024 Digital Trends Report. Understand the impact of AI, augmented and virtual reality, evolutions in digital content, and much more. Discover actionable tips to help you take your marketing strategy into the future!
Natalia ZhukovaFeb 28, 2024

Industry News

6 min read

The Impact of the November 2023 Core Update

On November 2, 2023, Google released its third core update in four months. Surprisingly, the update took nearly a month to roll out with Google announcing its completion on November 28th which is a divergence from the usual two or so weeks it takes for an update to complete.
Mordy ObersteinDec 22, 2023

Industry News

6 min read

October 2023 Google Algorithm Update Impact

On October 5, 2023, Google released its October 2023 Core Update. This update arrived in what has been a “sea of volatility” with the release of the October 2023 Spam Update just a day earlier.
Mordy ObersteinNov 06, 2023

Industry News

4 min read

INBOUND Recap: 4 Lessons about Revolutionizing B2B Sales with Revenue Acceleration

INBOUND‘s recap of actionable insights into how the modern salesforce can take advantage of the new trends and tools.
Alice SolOct 11, 2023

Industry News

12 min read

Top Semrush Updates You Won’t Want to Miss

The best Semrush updates of the year that you might have missed—and how you can use them to boost your visibility, beat your competition, and delight your audience.
Shannon O‘SheaJun 16, 2023

Industry News

4 min read

The State of Search 2023

The analysis highlights trends by using recent search data, but also comparing 2022 to 2021 to unpick how people searched, industries performed, and SERPs changed across the world.
Marcus ToberMay 11, 2023
Load more articles
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4

Boost your digital marketing efforts

Get free trial
